query.where: OrderId = '{$Id}' AND SBQQ__ContractAction__c in ('Quantity Decrease','Cancel') AND NS_Reference_Number__c = '' AND NS_Integration_Status__c = 'Submitted' Order By SBQQ__RevisedOrderProduct__r.Order.OrderReferenceNumber LIMIT 5000

assignment.title: Get RA Lines - To Be Processed

operation.expression: if(fn:string-length($temp.temp_calcSfdcNextOrder)=0) then true() else if($temp.temp_calcSfdcThisOrder=$temp.temp_calcSfdcNextOrder) then true() else false()

parameter.name: Input_ErrorString
parameter.expression: fn:concat("The RA line ", $temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem ," does not contain Revised Order Product.")

parameter.name: Input_ErrorString
parameter.expression: fn:concat("Sales Order ",$temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.SBQQ__RevisedOrderProduct__r.Order.OrderReferenceNumber ," and/or corresponding line ", $temp.temp_calcSfdcErrorOrderLine ," were not found in Netsuite")

service.title: Check RA Line Already Exist in Netsuite
Get Existing RA Line for SO Line

container.title: RA Line Doesn't Exist in NS?

parameter.name: Input_ErrorString
parameter.expression: fn:concat("The RA line ", $temp.temp_calcSfdcErrorOrderLine ," already exist in Netsuite, under the RA with internalId = ", $output.search_RA_internalId )

parameter.name: Input_ErrorString
parameter.expression:
fn:concat("Error Line: ", $temp.temp_calcSfdcErrorOrderLine, "; The sum of Current return authorization line's amount AND already authorized line's amount, cannot be more than that of original sales order line's amount ",
" Total Order Line Amount = ", $temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.SBQQ__RevisedOrderProduct__r.Net_Total_Price__c, ' Amount Already Authorized = ', if($output.search_RA_lineTotalAmount<0) then $output.search_RA_lineTotalAmount * -1 else if($output.search_RA_lineTotalAmount='') then '0' else $output.search_RA_lineTotalAmount , ' Current RA Line Amount = ', if($temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.Net_Total_Price__c<0) then $temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.Net_Total_Price__c * -1 else $temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.Net_Total_Price__c )

assignment.title: Calculate If SO Line Already Billed

operation.expression: let $sfdcRALineAmt := if($temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.Net_Total_Price__c<0) then $temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.Net_Total_Price__c * -1 else $temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.Net_Total_Price__c let $nsAmt := if($output.search_RA_lineTotalAmount<0) then $output.search_RA_lineTotalAmount * -1 else if($output.search_RA_lineTotalAmount='') then '0' else $output.search_RA_lineTotalAmount let $sfdcOrderLineAmt := if($temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.SBQQ__RevisedOrderProduct__r.Net_Total_Price__c<0) then $temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.SBQQ__RevisedOrderProduct__r.Net_Total_Price__c * -1 else $temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.SBQQ__RevisedOrderProduct__r.Net_Total_Price__c return if($sfdcOrderLineAmt<($sfdcRALineAmt+$nsAmt)) then true() else false()
if ($temp.temp_RAChildlessBundleFlag = 'F') then if ($temp.temp_SFDC_RAItem.Childless_Bundle_RA__c = 'true') then 'T' else 'F' else 'T'

assignment.title: Calculate Header Fields & Assign to RA
Assign RA Number to temp & out Field
Get Existing Error Queue - If Any

query.where: Source_System__c = 'Salesforce' AND Target_System__c = 'NetSuite' AND Status__c = 'Error' AND Transaction_Type__c = 'Return Authorization' AND Transaction_Id__c = '{$Id}'

assignment.title: Update SFDC RA Line with Success Details
